name: Fly Out Of Time
description:
Fly Out Of Time!

Every 10 seconds, the evil empire will fire its giant las-cannon at your ship. Your shields can only take a few hits before succumbing. Your only hope is to get out of range by shooting as many drones as possible to absorb their fuel, and increase your max speed. 

The faster you go, the more time will dilate, causing it to feel like it's taking longer for the las-cannon to shoot. Science!

Controls:

W/A/S/D to move your ship. Aim with the mouse, and fire with LMB.
